As far as inner city playgrounds go this is a safe bet. Plenty of options. Blue collar working class diverse area. There leadership needs to organize some community members to assist with the littering issue. There is plenty of free parking if your not within walking distance. I give the park a 3.5 stars out of 5. It can reach a 5 with better leadership & more community involvement. But it's definitely on the right track.
